abstract: Google’s stock price mysteriously plunged only minutes before the closing bell on Tuesday, but Nasdaq said it was precipitated only by erroneous trade orders from another exchange.
snippet: Google’s stock price mysteriously plunged only minutes before the closing bell on Tuesday, but Nasdaq said it was precipitated only by erroneous trade orders from another exchange.
lead_paragraph: For most of Tuesday, Google‘s stock was mostly flat. Then, around 3:57 p.m., it mysteriously plummeted, closing down 10.4 percent at $341.43.

headline.main: The Strange Case of the Google Stock Plunge
